attributes.action: Respect the referendum and leave the EU as voted for in a peoples vote already.
attributes.additional_details: The peoples vote took place on the referendum, we had a stay or leave vote, we voted leave, end of, I am sick and tired of the self-important remainers bleating on about a second vote because they did not like the fact they lost. What will happen if there is a second referendum, will all the losers demand another vote? It’s a farce because the dithering Tories  had NO plan if they lost, took too long in starting the protest, that gave the remainers time to group and start the long process of trying to reverse the WILL OF THE PEOPLE.
attributes.background: Stop self-Serving remainers bleating on and assuming the leavers are thick and need guidance

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we're not sure what you mean by "respect the referendum". If you would like the UK to leave the EU on 29 March 2019 then you might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/243319
